A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I were to give a one word review of The Last Jedi\, that word would be\, \"unexpected.\" Even if you don't include expectations built up before the release\, the movie surprises you every step of the way. Any time you think a character or situation will go one way\, the movie does what you'd least expect. This is the Star Wars of the future\, and this long time fan couldn't be happier.
